abstract: Lin-Manuel Miranda, a Tony Award-winning composer and lyricist, is set to play the role of Charley Kringas in the upcoming Encores! production of Stephen Sondheim's "Merrily We Roll Along."

lead_paragraph: Aside from playing Bernardo in a sixth-grade production of "West Side Story" and singing "Someone in a Tree" from "Pacific Overtures" in college, Lin-Manuel Miranda hasn't had much of an opportunity to perform the work of Stephen Sondheim.

headline.main: Here's Charley: Lin-Manuel Miranda Signs on to 'Merrily We Roll Along'
